item.title: Press Releases Get Social
item.description: The way companies share news has changed dramatically in recent years. The traditional press release, a formal document for journalists, has evolved into the social media news release. This shift is driven by the internet and the rise of social media. Companies issue press releases, also known as news releases or social media news releases, as a key part of public relations. Both PR and press releases focus on sharing information with a target audience, often the public.
